# possibly {#sec-doc}
    

::: {.callout-note appearance="simple" title="docblock" collapse=false}    


```{julia}
#| eval: false
possibly(f, otherwise = nothing)

```

Create a modified version of the function `f` such that it returns `otherwise` when `f(x)` throws an error.
 


:::
